name: createAccessRule
description: This API creates an access rule.

name: getAccessRules
description: This API returns an array of access rules associated with the rolls of the caller. A DSS access rule permits members of a role to create DSS subscriptions associated with an oem model, device property, client type, and subscription type.

name: deleteAccessRule
description: This API deletes the specified access rule.

name: getAccessRule
description: This API returns the specified access rule.

name: createSubscription
description: This API creates a subscription associated with a corresponding access rule.

name: getSubscriptions
description: This API returns an array of subscriptions each associated with a corresponding access rule.

name: deleteSubscription
description: This API deletes the specified subscription.

name: getSubscription
description: This API returns a subscription associated with a corresponding access rule.

name: login
description: This API authenticates an SSO application.

name: createContact
description: This API creates a contact.

name: getContacts
description: This API returns an array of all contacts associated with the caller.

name: deleteContact
description: This API deletes a contact.

name: getContact
description: This API returns details about a contact.

name: updateContact
description: This API updates details for the contact.
request_description: The request data should include only the contactId and the fields to modify.

name: linkUserAccounts
description: This API creates an association between two user accounts in different OEM accounts.

name: unlinkUserAccounts
description: This API unlinks the user account of the caller from the user account specified by the User ID parameter.

name: createShare
description: This API creates a shared resource.

name: deleteShareByUserId
description: This API unshares from userId the resource specified by resource_name and resource_id.

name: getShares
description: This API returns an array of resources (e.g. devices, groups) shared by the caller.

name: deleteShareByShareId
description: This API unshares the specified resource.

name: getShare
description: This API returns the specified share.

name: updateShare
description: This API updates the specified share.

name: getReceivedShares
description: This API returns an array of resources shared with the user.

name: createDatapoints
description: This API creates one or more datapoints.

name: getDevices
description: This API returns an array of devices registered to, or shared with, the caller. The key value in the Response Body is the unique device id, so use this value in calls to other operations that require a device id parameter.

name: registerDevice
description: This API registers the device to the caller.

name: getDeviceByDevId
description: This API returns the specified device.

name: renameDeviceByDevId
description: This API renames a device.

name: unregisterDevice
description: This API unregisters the specified device from the caller.

name: factoryResetDevice
description: This API resets device settings to factory defaults.

name: identifyZigbeeNode
description: This API is used only with Zigbee nodes. A command is sent to the specified Zigbee node with a turn-on for a defined time (in seconds). The update needs to identify one node among many nodes in a Zigbee gateway.

name: updateDeviceLocation
description: This API updates device location.

name: getNodesByDevId
description: This API returns an array of nodes associated with the specified gateway.

name: getPropertiesByDevId
description: This API returns an array of properties for the specified device.

name: getPropertyByDevId
description: This API returns a property for the specified device.

name: createDatapointByDevId
description: This API creates a datapoint for the specified property. The metadata in the request data is optional.

name: openRegistrationWindow
description: This API opens and polls the registration window (only applies to Zigbee gateways).

name: createSchedule
description: This API creates a schedule.

name: getSchedules
description: This API returns an array of schedules for the specified device.

name: updateSchedule
description: This API updates a schedule.

name: getScheduleByName
description: This API returns a schedule by name of the specified device.

name: transferRegistration
description: This API transfers registration from the caller to the specified user.

name: getRegistrableDevice
description: This API returns the registration candidate that matches the input parameters. If the DSN is passed, there must be an exact match. If multiple devices are found, only the most recently connected candidate is returned.

name: getDeviceByDsn
description: This API returns the specified device.

name: renameDeviceByDsn
description: This API renames a device.

name: createDeviceMetadatum
description: This API creates metadata for the specified device.

name: getDeviceMetadata
description: This API returns metadata associated with the specified device.

name: deleteDeviceMetadatum
description: This API deletes a single metadatum for the specified device.

name: getDeviceMetadatum
description: This API returns a single metadatum for the specified device.

name: updateDeviceMetadatum
description: This API updates a single metadatum for the specified device.

name: getPropertiesByDsn
description: This API returns an array of properties for the specified device.

name: getPropertyByDsn
description: This API returns a property for the specified device.

name: createDatapointByDsn
description: This API creates a datapoint for the specified property. The metadata in the request data is optional.

name: getDatapoints
description: This API returns datapoints for the specified property.

name: createPropertyTrigger
description: This API creates a trigger for the specified property.

name: getPropertyTriggers
description: This API returns triggers attached to the specified property.

name: getPropertyTriggersAll
description: This API returns triggers attached to the specified property.

name: getNodesByDsn
description: This API returns an array of nodes associated with the specified gateway.

name: getDeviceTimeZone
description: This API returns the time zone of the device's location.

name: setDeviceTimeZone
description: This API updates the time zone of the device's location.

name: createGroup
description: This API creates a device group.

name: getGroups
description: This API returns an array of device groups.

name: deleteGroup
description: This API deletes the specified group.

name: getGroup
description: This API returns the specified group.

name: renameGroup
description: This API renames the specified group.

name: createDatapointsInGroup
description: This API updates the values of the specified properties for all the devices in the specified device group.

name: createDatapointInGroup
description: This API updates the value of a single property for all the devices in the specified device group.

name: getDatapointsInGroup
description: This API returns an array of datapoints for the specified properties of all devices in the specified device group.

name: addDeviceToGroup
description: This API adds a device to a group.

name: removeDeviceFromGroup
description: This API removes a device from a group.

name: deleteScheduleAction
description: This API deletes a schedule action.

name: getScheduleAction
description: This API returns a schedule action.

name: updateScheduleAction
description: This API updates a schedule action.

name: getSchedule
description: This API returns the specified schedule.

name: clearSchedule
description: This API clears a schedule.

name: createScheduleAction
description: This API creates a schedule action.

name: getScheduleActions
description: This API returns an array of schedule actions.

name: getScheduleAction
description: This API returns a schedule action.

name: getSchedulesForUser
description: This API returns schedules accessible by user.

name: getTimeZone
description: This API returns information about the specified time zone.

name: createUserAccount
description: This API creates a user account in the Ayla Public Account.

name: deleteUserAccount
description: This API deletes the caller's user account.

name: updateUserAccount
description: This API changes the password or updates other account information.
request_description: If changing password, send only the first two fields. Otherwise, delete these two fields.

name: getUserByUuid
description: This API returns information about the specified user.

name: confirmUserAccount
description: This API confirms the user account based on the confirmation token supplied.

name: sendHowToConfirm
description: This API sends confirmation instructions.

name: getUserProfile
description: This API returns information about the caller\'s user profile.

name: sendHowToReset
description: This API resends password reset instructions.

name: refreshToken
description: This API returns a new access_token and refresh_token.

name: getTokens
description: This API returns an access token and a refresh token.

name: returnTokens
description: This API expires the access tokens.

name: updateEmail
description: This API updates the caller's email.
